ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 120
ygData.msgSnippet: Trezdon is a Necromancer. If you speak with Ulan Meadowgreen (named Centaur in S Karana that gives the quest), he will tell you a story about an evil Dark Elf
ygData.messageBody:
Trezdon is a Necromancer. If you speak with Ulan Meadowgreen (named Centaur in
S Karana that gives the quest), he will tell you a story about an evil Dark Elf
Necromancer, blah blah blah. The Dark Circlet is actually a pretty decent piece
of headgear but is NEC only. I think it's better than the Savants Cap but not
as good as the Runed Circlet. I'm sure after you get your greaves, if you're
ever back in Najena camping JBoots or something, pick up another Dark Circlet
and you might be able to sell it for a good buck.
